subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Lawns
lead_paragraph: The tournament, in Stuttgart, Germany, is no longer being held on red clay, and it has been moved up on the calendar, with there now being three weeks between the French Open and Wimbledon.
snippet: The tournament, in Stuttgart, Germany, is no longer being held on red clay, and it has been moved up on the calendar, with there now being three weeks between the French Open and Wimbledon.
